job description:
Top 3 Skills:
  • SQL proficiency (3-5 yrs exp)- pulling data, writing queries, understanding relational database concepts. Finding data that meetings logic statements and turning specs from CMS to queries that relate to data
  • Data Modeling: Knowing where to look in a database for information, ie: if looking for a diagnosis, where in table do you need to look
  • Healthcare/Clinical industry experience- specifically with quality measures like HEDIS (ACO, meaningful use, Star, etc.)
About TEKsystems:

We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company.
